title: Steal My Girl
lyrics: She's been my queen since we were 16 We dream the same dreams alright I got it all 'cause she is the one Her dad calls me 'son' alright I know I know I know for sure Everybody wanna steal my girl Everybody wanna take her heart away Couple billion in the whole wide world Find another one 'cause she belongs to me Na na na na na na (oh yeah) Na na na na na na Kisses like queen her walk is so lean When she's in those jeans alright I don't exist if I don't have her The world doesn't turn alright I know I know I know for sure Everybody wanna steal my girl Everybody wanna take her heart away Couple billion in the whole wide world Find another one 'cause she belongs to me Na na na na na na (oh yeah) Na na na na na na She knows she knows That I never let her down before She knows she knows That I'm never gonna let another take her love from me now Everybody wanna steal my girl Everybody wanna take her heart away Couple billion in the whole wide world Find another one 'cause she belongs to me Na na na na na na (oh yeah) Na na na na na na
